abstract.t: This document proposes an extension to the Session InitiationProtocol, RFC-2543[3]. The extension adds the PROPOSE method to theSIP protocol. The intend of the PROPOSE method is to allow a MediaGateway or other types of server that is serving a SIP node in alive session to propose a revised session setting to the node due tochanges in network or other constraints of the current session. Anexample of revised session setting could be a suggestion to the nodeto lower its quality of service or choose a lower bandwidth codecdue to an increase in network traffic.
